name: Fragment's Note
description:
The long-awaited visual novel is finally available in English!
All features of this game are in English.
 This game is available for iPhone, iPod　touch, and iPad.
(Recommended iPhone　3GS/iPod touch　3GS or later)
- Game Summary -
A mysterious girl from the future guides our protagonist to grasping a happy future.
Help the protagonist make life-changing decisions through a school romance visual novel leading to different heroins and alternate endings!
- Synopsis -
"I-I can't, you're like a little brother to me. Besides, I already have a boyfriend..."
"... I'm sorry."
One not-so-special afternoon, I ? Yukiha Tenjo ? confess my love to a childhood friend and get turned down.
But before I have any time to grieve, a girl suddenly presents herself in front of me.
"Nice to meet you!"
"I'm your daughter from the future, and I traveled all the way back in time to change your life for the better!"
That's how I met my self-proclaimed daughter-of-the future, who changes my entire life.
That was the beginning of it all.
The beginning of my new future.
- Notifications -
Follow us on Twitter at @UxA_ADV for live updates on "Fragment's Note"!
* All tweets are in Japanese.
